game.title: Game Title
game.synopsis: Some Game's story goes like this: The player takes on the role of Jane, an aspiring model who is struggling to make it in a big city. A chance encounter leads her to a wealthy businessman who asks her to help locate his missing daughter, who was kidnapped by ruthless criminals. Jane sets off on a dangerous quest across the city in pursuit of the criminals and the missing daughter. Along the way, she learns valuable lessons about herself and discovers that she's more capable than she thought. The game ends with a climactic showdown between Jane and her enemies, and a resolution for all.
